channel.title: Run.bat linux help
channel.description:
hey can someone help me convert my run.bat to linux usable for my vps
"@echo off color 0b title Running SindiCatepk Server..... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause "
i know i have to make into a shell file but whats the new code for linux translation
